title: Earthquakes without frontiers: a partnership for increasing resilience to seismic hazard in the continents
abstractText: Please refer to the forms submitted by the Lead Institution (Cambridge) for this proposal.
impactText: This is the third year of a five year project and there are as yet no findings.
findingsText: Working in Kazakhstan in a post-Soviet environment has proven both very challenging and very awarding, in particular involving the reassessment of many approaches and methodologies frequently employed in other developing countries. At the moment, preliminary steps to link NGOs working in DRR and emergency managers to academe have proven quite successful especially in provincial centres such as Shymkent and Taraz where little contact was had previous;y Other
